title: Emily Ratajkowski goes ring shopping with Sebastian Bear-McClard after secret wedding in NYC
text:
She's used to the finer things in life.

And Emily Ratajkowski enjoyed a jewelry shopping session with her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard in New York City on Saturday.

The couple were accompanied by their dog, Colombo, who at one point appeared to be getting a scolding from his mom and dad.

All that glitters! Emily Ratajkowski enjoyed a jewelry shopping session with her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard in New York City on Saturday

Emily showcased her stylish fashion sense in an oversized coat that was cinched in at the waist with an animal print belt.

She completed her ensemble with blue denim straight legged jeans and a black form-fitting top underneath.

The model walked along with square cut boots that had a small heel.

Fashionista: Emily showcased her stylish fashion sense in an oversized coat that was cinched in at the waist with an animal print belt

Stellar: She completed her ensemble with blue denim straight legged jeans and a black form-fitting top underneath

Being naughty: Both Emily and Sebastian were seen giving Colombo a stern look with their hands pointing at him while in the shop

Emily's brunette tresses were styled out naturally and she accessorised with round gold earrings.

Her glam consisted of a clear complexion, blushed cheeks and a plump nude pout.

Sebastian also braved the chilly morning in a large lined coat and trousers.

No fuss look: Emily's brunette tresses were styled out naturally and she accessorised with round gold earrings

Taking their dog out: Colombo walked along with his parents with his rainbow leash

Colombo walked along with his parents with his rainbow leash.

However, he appeared to not be that well behaved when they arrived at Mociun jewelry store in Brooklyn, New York.

Both Emily and Sebastian were seen giving Colombo a stern look with their hands pointing at him.

Mom's not impressed: Colombo appeared to not be that well behaved when they arrived at Mociun jewelry store in Brooklyn, New York

Adding to their collection: The pair were looking at nice jewelry

Birthday wishes: Emily shared a shot with Sebastian to celebrate her best friend's and business partner, Kat Mendenhall's, birthday

The pair sparked attention earlier in the month when the actress took to her social media page and deleted some photos with Sebastian.

But things appear to be fine between Emily and Sebastian with the beauty sharing a shot with him on her Instagram Stories earlier in the day to celebrate her best friend's and business partner, Kat Mendenhall's, birthday.

'you're a great addition to my marriage,' she captioned.

Insta hubby! Kat shared a photo with Sebastian last week to which Emily jokingly replied: 'stealing my mans'

She also commented on Kat's latest social post she shared with Sebastian.

'Insta Hubby,' Kat captioned.

Emily commented: 'Stealing my mans,' to which she replied: '@emrata all two of them.'

The I Feel Pretty star and Sebastian wed on February 23, 2018, in a New York Court House. She never made her relationship or engagement known.

Deleted: Emily deleted some pics with her man off of her feed earlier in the one (including the photo above)
description: Emily Ratajkowski was spotted going ring shopping with her husband Sebastian Bear-McClard on Saturday morning - following their secret wedding at a NYC courthouse in 2018.
